title: Bug 114470[Smoke]Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description: When trying to use new Date("3/2/2005") as a value in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: When using new Date("3/2/2005") as a value in a table filter, an error message is displayed on the report page. The error states: 'There are error(s) in Table: table8. Error0: data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s)). Detail: An error occurred in data type conversion. Cannot convert it to Date. Cannot convert it to Date'.
EB: When using new Date("3/2/2005") as a value in a table filter, the filter should work without errors. No error messages should be displayed on the report page.
SR:
1. Open the report.
2. Apply a table filter.
3. Use new Date("3/2/2005") as the value in the filter.
4. Save and preview the report.
5. Verify that the filter works without any error messages being displayed.
